definition: root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
(of a bird, animal or plant) male/key/hills
red/pellet/powder/cinnabar
leather/skin/fur/CL:張|张[zhang1]/pico- (one trillionth)/naughty
surname Pi

sentences.english: The effects of aqueous decoction of peony radices cortex(ADPRC) on C.
sentences.chinese: 研究牡丹皮水煎劑對體外白念珠菌生物膜的影響。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the identification methods for Cortex Moutan and Radix Stephaniae Tetrandrae in Lixin Pill.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究利心丸中的牡丹皮和防己的鑑別方法。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the quality of Cortex Moudan which grew for four years from main planting parts in Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析安徽主要牡丹皮產地四年生的牡丹皮質量。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the quality of Cortex Moudan which grew for four years from main planting parts in Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析安徽主要牡丹皮產地四年生的牡丹皮質量。

sentences.english: Conclusion The method can be used scientifically as a quality control for Moutan cortex.
sentences.chinese: 結論爲牡丹皮藥材的質量控制提供了科學的依據。

sentences.english: Methods: Volume analysis is used to determine the microscopic characteristic constants of Cortex Moutan.
sentences.chinese: 採用容量分析法對牡丹皮進行顯微特徵常數值的測定。

definition: the root bark of the peony tree
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
red nut sedge (Cyperus rotundus)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
chuanxiong rhizome
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
Anemarrhena asphodeloides/rhyzome of Anemarrhena (used in TCM)
bitter orange (Fructus aurantii) (used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
Manchurian wild ginger (family Asarum)
Salvia miltiorrhiza
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
gypsum CaSO4·2(H2O)/plaster
